lines.text: FOR ONE WILD ECSTATIC MOMENT I WOULD HAVE GONE ANYWHERE
I TOOK A JOB AS A
I'D LOOK UP MY OLD FRIEND
EVEN IF HE WAS A LITTLE DRUNK, I WAS GLAD TO SEE HIM.
THE MINUTE HE CAME IN, THE OLD FEELING BEGAN TO
I'VE MISSED YOU, BABY! GIMME A LITTLE KISS...
JUST FOR OL' TIMES' SAKE -- HOW ABOUT IT?
MY FEELINGS FOR HIM WERE THE SAME, BUT I DIDN'T WANT IT TO BE
